website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for smoked food connoisseurs who like the idea of a versatile smoker and don't mind a few design quirks.
pros: We love how this top-selling smoker can also be used to grill and roast some of your favorite foods
Powered by propane and proprietary TRU-Infrared heat for even results that maintain natural juices
cons: Some of the components come with quality concerns, such as the smoke and drip trays that don't fit very well

customer_reviews.title: A Bad compromise between grill & smoker
customer_reviews.text: This grill/smoker is marketed for doing either function well, but in practice does neither one effectively....It cannot maintain teperatures less than 210F (too hot for smoking), what smoke is produced is is directed AWAY from the meat and out the vents, and there is very little charring (no direct flame) in grill mode. Bottom line, I can do everything this unit does in my gas oven in the kitchen... so why even bother?
customer_reviews.author: groundguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cook turkeys and chickens. Makes a 15 lb turkey in under an hour. Great for roasting pork roasts and whole chickens. This is even a better grill, no flair ups. Great for grilling steaks, pork tenderloins, any kind of chicken, especially burgers , bratwurst and kielbasa. Have never used as a smoker , have three other smokers for that. If you like to grill , perfect , heats up in a flash and does not use a lot of fuel. Cooks food in a jiffy.
customer_reviews.author: Boiler King

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Con: It's too hot on the lowest setting. It's hard to cook things very slowly, unless you keep the lid open. Pros: Everything else. It's a great grill. You need the accessory pack for hanging drumsticks and ribs, and for kabobs. But get an injector, shoot a chicken or a turkey full of your favorite stuff, and cook it as slowly as possible for a few hours. It's perfect. Even the wood chip holder is great. I thought it was going to be too small, but it's perfect. And the drippings get caught in the grease trap instead of your midsection. And what's better than cooking outdoors when it's 100 degrees.........
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: I have used the Char-Broil Big Easy twice and the roaster has impressed me thus far
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Char-Broil Big Easy twice and the roaster has impressed me thus far. The install was quite easy and intuitive, you don't need much mechanical background to assemble this unit. I ordered the accessory kit as well as the cover, and they all were delivered promptly. With the accessory kit you will find your options for cooking different foods are endless. I have noticed that after close to five hours of use, this unit does not consume much propane. As many other reviewers have mentioned, the meat cooked from the Big Easy is very tender and the clean up process is super easy. Just follow the seasoning directions and you will be roasting in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Jayce

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t meet expectations as a big turkey “air fryer”
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I’ve seen some YouTube videos that make it look great. We’ve cooked four turkeys so far, and it does an okay job. It’s really hot in there, and I cook with a remote thermometer in the breast. It tends to overcook the wings and legs. I like the smoke component, and as a grill it’s small but cooks a nice steak. I’ve kind of enjoyed cooking chicken breasts in the basket with some smoke.
customer_reviews.author: diatonic

customer_reviews.title: I literally cook in this every. Single. Day.
customer_reviews.text: We are on the carnivore diet and eat only meat and water. I honestly can say that I use this every single day. It is an amazing smoker/grill for apartments. We made two turkeys for Thanksgiving (not at the same time), I've made lollipop chicken, we cook our steaks and burgers on it - literally every piece of meat we eat is cooked in this device. I can't say enough good things about it. The only negative I can probably come up with is that the temperature is always a little high for smoking (250-300F) but with an internal thermometer we've never had overcooked food, and it's always juicy. 10/10 - would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Shepard

customer_reviews.title: This Char-broil worked well at first. Then after 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This Char-broil worked well at first. Then after 3 uses the flame would not light. Before i knew it the return time had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: but it was good to know
customer_reviews.text: I read through the reviews and decided to purchase this Infrared grill to cook the Thanksgiving. The turkey came out perfectly, it took 2 and half hours to cook it. The skin was crispy, the meat was juicy, all in all it was spectacular. I made twin chickens the other day, I did notice that the top chicken cooked much faster than the one on the bottom. This wasn't a big deal, since I only needed one at the time, but it was good to know. I definitely recommend this product, highly convenient and a big time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Mattei

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this cooker. We have tried about everything except smoking brisket on it including corn on the cob. It heats very uniformly and even better than our large Char Broil Tru-Infrared grill does. We plan to take it on our next long camping trip even though it is much heavier than our Roadtrip. This product is great for cooking burgers and chicken without having to worry every second about burning and flames. BBQ'd chicken breasts come out perfect along with pork roast and ribs. The only way I could improve it is by being able to quickly break it down to fit in the bed of the truck under our fiver.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: yum whole chicken
customer_reviews.text: this thing is like a grill, smoker, and enormous air frier all in one. makes amazing whole chickens, steak, brisket. great price. doesnt use much gas it seems like which is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3boys

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq
customer_reviews.text: While this might not be the best bbq or the best smoker, it's a great mod range solution for those of us who like to dabble in both but aren't looking to be master cooks. I bought some highly rated wood pellets for the smoker and it works great. I've tried those little smoker boxes in a traditional bbq and have never been impressed. With this one, you can actually taste the difference. It also does a great job roasting a chicken. For the price, I highly recommend this bbq!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cooker. Far more versatile than a fryer or a barbecue grill
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. We had already cooked a 15 lb turkey using a neighbors Big Easy (smaller model). Liked it so much we bought the larger one. Cooked a 25 lb turkey for Thanksgiving and everyone loved it. Crispy all over and moist inside. Couldn't be better. We are planning a large beef roast and ribs! Also impressed with the assembly: all screw holes lined up perfectly. This is a very sturdy unit and expect a long life. Much better than oil fryer especially when you clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Tractorjimm

customer_reviews.title: Rhe "NEW" way to Barbecue
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been saying, "We should get a smoker", but I had a Charbroil Infrared that I loved. This summer the Infrared died and we made the move for the smoker. First time we used it we smoked a brisket. It was phenomenal. I recommend this highly for all your outdoor cooking adventures. Additionally, it is very portable. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: The best grill!
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to buy this grill. You will fall in love with it. I have a great recipe for tri-tips and when I brings to friends to grill it at their house, the flavor is not there. This grill gives meat a smokey flavor that other grills (more expensive one) cant. This grill does make the difference. Everything comes out from it is very juicy. I grilled the best tri tips and made the best ribs out of this grill. I cannot speak enough for it. Best investment I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: cybergirlllvn

customer_reviews.title: Will update later
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but we did not try to cook a whole chicken or turkey in it and we did not try to smoke anything. We did grill lamb chops and burger patties and corn and veggies and it worked well. Assembly was not fun, it comes pretty much with ALL parts apart and my boyfriend was not happy having to spend ah hour putting it together. But overall it is pretty decent (wait till we try smoking anything, lol) and my boyfriend likes it (it was his birthday gift).
customer_reviews.author: Taty Z Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality...screws don’t properly fit causing the handles and anything attached to the cooker itself to be loose...no explanation on what the right control knob is supposed to do...grease collection tray doesn’t fit properly in the grooves or slots...too narrow...requested a new one...was sent the same size one...they discontinued making this model...understandably so...won’t light by using the built in igniter...overall a regrettable purchase...
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Smoker, Grill & Broiler
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market to get a smoker but ended up with this and without doubt the best choice I ever made. Its not such a slow smoker and will generally cook most cuts in 1 to 2 hours and smoke and cook a chicken in 2 to 3 hours. Using smoke pellets the cook quality and taste is outstanding and its yet to produce a bad meal. Five Stars without reservation....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kirpalani

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Would Do It Again!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the big easy for a month now and love it. Makes a great smoker,grill, and roaster. Ribs are incredible and I've cooked beef, chicken and pork-all turned out great with good smoky flavor. I was concerned about the surface area of the grill but it gets the job done. I grilled tonight and was able to fit seven 1/3lb burgers on there. Great tool for the money, make sure to buy the geill cover. Assembly took an hour and started right up. My only complaint is that the grill top and basket are difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Conover

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks great . I use a grille year round and this has become my favorite grille. I will say that if you have a large group that you are cooking for on a regular basis, the grilling area isn't that large and you may want to look at a grille that has more surface space. But for a family of four the grilling space is adequate for us. The amazing thing is that you can smoke and cook meat in so many different ways with this grille! I am well pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Duck

customer_reviews.title: Working well.
customer_reviews.text: For a small smoker / Grill / roaster this is a great unit to own. Cooks fantastic. Cleaning is a pain as the basket and grill plate needs to be cleaned in the kitchen sink but I give both the Smoker and Grilling a 10. Meats come out with a fantastic smoke taste and are much more moisture then expected. Can cook 3 16oz steaks... Can kind of squeeze a 4th one on if needed. Basket is large enough to cook two standard chickens at once.
customer_reviews.author: William Vanderoef

customer_reviews.title: You will love this little work horse!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than thrilled with the Big Easy, unbelievable results for the cost...everything I have tested on this has turned out fantastic! And the time frame for cooking or smoking is shorter than other similar products...the 1 and only draw back was the assembly instructions..they were a joke, I mean literally we laughed when we saw them. They aren't instructions at all more like pictures with action words..several pieces drawn with arrows and something like "ASSEMBLE " underneath said picture. once we did puzzle through the instructions, the smoker/roaster/grill h as s been fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Cook

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the Thanksgiving turkey, burgers, and steaks. I didn't get it for the smoker aspect and haven't used it for that, however. Some people state the temperature doesn't quite go low enough for that but I knew that going in since multipurpose usually means a compromise somewhere. For the turkey...wow. Cooked a little faster than the bird weight calculation said it should but came out great. Kinda cool it came with a big bird cage and handle. Burgers....not much to say. Fries 'em quick. The steaks came out amazing. Seared on the outside and perfect inside. This is a great cooker. I dig it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: NOT AN EFFICIENT SMOKER
customer_reviews.text: I lusted after this grill for years. It is easy to use and takes up very little space. There is only one temperature zone. I love this grill for roasting chicken. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS GRILL IF YOU WANT A SMOKER!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Grease pan does not fit designed rails
customer_reviews.text: Overall, product is good. But grease pan does not fit rails. So grease pan moves all over the place if grill is moved. Also, grill does not distribute heat well. Meats at closer to too of grill cook way faster than bottom trays. Maybe I have not used it enough, but it takes more effort to use this grill. Not sure I would recommend this grill to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Misheck Ghumra

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product! Would Absolutely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! So versatile. Can "fry" whole chickens and turkeys or use to sear meats then turn down and cook. Makes the best chicken wings. Has a catch tray for juices in case you want to make gravy. Don't have to deal with cooking oil. Have only used grill part once simply bc I already have a grill but this one worked great. Smoking option is awesome addition. Love this so much we bought my in laws one for Christmas and the electric version for my dad for Father's Day! Also bought the attachment kit. First one I received was damaged by Amazon sent a replacement right out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SRG and it finally arrived a week later. No fault of Amazon. UPS continues to have issues, IMO. It was relatively easy to assemble, although the directions could be a little clearer. I seasoned it per the instructions and then smoked a Boston Butt. It may have taken a little longer to cook than I expected but it turned out great and maybe better than I expected, being my first experience on it. I highly recommend it. BTW-I bought the oil-less turkey fryer last year and now love using both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Flyingfleet

customer_reviews.title: Very nice grill / smoker!
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice little smoker for the price. It gets the job done. I also got one for my daughter and my son, they like theirs as well. I would buy this again and would recommend it to anyone. I am not very handy when it comes to putting things together, I'm visual and looked over you tube for someone putting theirs together. I could not find a full showing, I should have made a film. After figuring out the first one, the next 2 were easy and fast to do.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Traeger instead
customer_reviews.text: If you already own a Traeger you will be disappointed with the Char-Broil. If you have ever tasted a turkey that has been deep fried in a Masterbuilt Fryer, you will be disappointed with the Char-Broil. Beyond that, the striker did not work out of the box first time. Handles made of soft metal and bend. After one experience, I'd rather have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Pitts MD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my husband for Christmas purely by reading the reviews. I and he are not disappointed, we absolutely love it. It was easy to put together and looks great. You can bbq with it or add pellets or chips for the full smoke flavour. Easy to use and clean. The words of my husband “I like this even more than I thought I would”. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: wanted a smoker
customer_reviews.text: You get a smoker, grill and so much more. Food tastes great, size is so compact, but room is deceiving, it's huge inside. We love it, smoked a turkey, smoked a ham and a chicken, fast and yummy. We have a large gas grill, which is no longer being used. Love it, recommend to everyone, My brother-in-law has 3 of them. Price is amazing..
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Shea

customer_reviews.title: It's a throw away grill after about 24 months
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a higher rating if it had lasted longer than 24 months. Grilling and smoking attributes are good, 4 stars. However the overall build of the product are poor. Rust, paint peeling, and spark ingiter no longer works. This grill lives in dry San Diego and sits under a completely covered patio, so very little exposure to elements. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Needs A Temperature Gauge Built Into The Hood
customer_reviews.text: If I could only have one grill/smoker this would be it. This one is all pro's except one thing, it doesn't come with a temperature gauge built in. I was informed by Char-Broil if I install one it will void my warranty. How simple it would be for them to manufacture it with a gauge built into the hood. I bought a $10 gauge and installed it anyway. I would give it 5 stars easily if Char-Broil manufactured it with a temperature gauge built in!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works good, poor designs and welds.
customer_reviews.text: The thing works good, but not made good. Used it for the first time and the poorly welded smoker box broke. I couldn't get it of because the metal expanded because if a crappy weld, and then the 4 spot welds broke when I was trying to pull it off. Amazon took care of this problem without a problem at all. Was really surprised. Good product, poor quality craftsmanship, but hey, I guess that is a lot if things these days
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Great convection or rotissery cooking, even grilling. Smoker box poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Cooking is easy food is exception. It's almost everything they say it is. Wood hopper is a neat idea but defective. Expansion shiv on the top allows for some room but not enough. The angle of the box should allow room to slide up and out. Wedge or not the box sticks and is extremely difficult to dislodge after heating.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results every time !!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit does all the things I want from outdoor cooking and I love it !! BBQs are a pain to deal with compared with the Big Easy and the results are fabulous !! I can do any thing with this one unit, that I'd need three if not four units to do the same and it's truly affordable and well made and compact while being fool proof !! Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: michael nantel

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. There is no need to know temperature in the chamber, just the food so buy a good remote probe thermometer. I kept looking for times and such for recipes and found nothing specific and that’s because you don’t need it. Just put the meat in the basket and turn it on and walk away until your thermometer alarm sounds. Best tasting roasted chicken ever!
customer_reviews.author: will in jax

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum in my tum tum
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cooks , originally I bought it for Thanksgiving and figured it would be one of those only use on holidays but I use it 2-3 times a week it works great as a grill . I like that I can put a whole chicken In the basket and the add potatoes wrapped I foil and they alm cook at the same time . I would purchase the kit that's sold separately from the start .
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: How easy to use and flavor is fantiastic
customer_reviews.text: I live in the South and use this Char Broil Big Easy almost every day. Burgers, hot dogs, chicken breast, whole chicken, turkey, brats. Awesome smoked flavor and so easy to use and keep clean. No flare ups no flame touching the food. Awesome. Already have one, just purchasing this one to put in storage incase my old one wears out and can't find another.
customer_reviews.author: DAU

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker
customer_reviews.text: SRG is a great cooker. So far I've made a pork butt, grilled some steaks and several burgers. Having the grill grate is an excellent addition to the unit. I suggest if you want to know more about these charbroiled units you head over to let's talk bbq. They have a forum section on these units and a guy who uses these in competition bbq. You will have any questions answered and learn some modifications to make these cookers even better. For the price I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Smoke-It, Roast-It, Grill-It, EAT-IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sorta skeptical before buying but after using the Char-Broil Infrared Big Easy the past three (3) weekends for: burgers, Boston Butt, Rib & a whole chicken - I'm completely sold. The only negative thing I have to say is the wood chip hopper is a pain in the rump to get out.
customer_reviews.author: jdfig

customer_reviews.title: Cooks great but Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that it is not constructed very well. Handles are flimsy and I don't see them holding up for a tailgating season of in and out of a truck. The grease pan does not follow the curve of the barrel and once the cooker heats up the smoke box is next to impossible to remove and fill. Also handle on smoke box is super flimsy. Really impressed with the cooking ability of the fryer, just wish it was built better
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best grill of all time for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best grill I have ever purchased. Everything cooks evenly with no flare ups or burnt food. I am 58 years old and have had all types as I cook outside most of time when eating at home. Nothing comes close to this. I have turned into a master chef ! Even when grandkids come visit can cook for 6-7 on this Big Easy. A+
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Didriksen

customer_reviews.title: Versatility, even grilling, resemblance to R2-D2
customer_reviews.text: What else could you ask for? Maybe a wider version, but this thing is awesome. My only complaint is the wood chip holder. It is an absolute nightmare to get in and out. Every single time I try to take it out, I feel like I'm going to rip the whole side of the grill off. Other than that, it cooks very evenly, and the smoking and roasting drum is so awesome. -------------------- Update a year later: This grill is still running GREAT! I have learned how to finesse the wood pellet box. This grill is incredible. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchy

customer_reviews.title: Big and Easy is Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my father, for Christmas 2015. And since he got it, pretty much 5 days out of the week, it's being used for something, whether it is grilling Portuguese sausage for breakfast, steak for dinner or even a turkey/chicken, it's being used at least that much time during the week. It's not the best smoker, but cherry wood for chicken, the best XD And according to my father, pretty easy to clean. He cleans it pretty much after every use or before, not hefty cleaning, but brushing here and there. Just today, he grilled some marinated short-ribs (Kal-bi) XD yay! We're having Korean tonight!
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiGal808

customer_reviews.title: Great for Year Round healthy cooking
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I only wish i had bought this thing many years ago. I have cooked two turkeys 4 racks of ribs 2 chickens all on different days on the same tnak of gas. The amount of fat that just drains out is sobering to think that we use to eat that much fat. This machine shows you dont have to compromise taste to eat lean.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: our second big easy char broil
customer_reviews.text: The first one lasted 7 years and we loved it so much that we had to get another one. The infra-red cooking works very well, evenly cooking without exposing the food to direct flames. Yes, it does take a little time to assemble it, but the grill is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: tairving

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: The temperature only has high or low. This is the only problem I have with this product. We are enjoying the meals we have made so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor cooker
customer_reviews.text: There are many useful pieces that come with this 3 in 1 cooker. I am impressed with how easy it is to add a little smoke to the cooking event. I have done a 20lb Turkey that was sensational, smoked ribs, butts, steaks on the grill and they all work easily and well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not great directions
customer_reviews.text: Used it for Thanksgiving. Was really amazing. Skin was crispy and the inside juicy. The fact it takes way less time than an oven, and cleaner than both an oil fryer and baking, I could not be happier. I’m about performance and quality and so far this does not disappoint. The directions on the other hand.....I’m pretty good at following directions and putting things together. These are pretty bad. Took way longer than I wanted. Honestly, the picture on the box was more helpful. But again, its fantastic. Really interested in trying the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: This item is built very and i stress very cheap you will fight to get the smoke box in and out you will most likely distrol this because it will not work and the drip pan is fabricated not to fit . Oh did you notice that you cant return this item sad purchase check out these similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The multifunction grill with the roaster, grill and smoker is why I purchased this. I gave it four stars because it was difficult for me to assemble, so a neighbor did this for me. For a small family (1-3 people) it is adequate but the grill area is small so wouldn't work for a large family. There have been no issues and would purchase it again. I do use a grill mat for chicken, hamburgers, hot dogs so prevent sticking. Brats need to drain the fat as they cook.
customer_reviews.author: jackalope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent combination of features and function.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this Smoker-Roaster-Grill for a couple of weeks now. I have never enjoyed grilling so much. I have turned out perfect Tri-Tip using the smoker and wonderfully done steaks on the grill. I've alo used the SRG to prepare ham. It is truly the easiest grill that I have ever used. The only limitation that I have seen is that I sometimes grill a large quantity of burgers and hotdogs for all of our children & grandchildren. I found that grill space was a bit limited for that application. But for everything else it absolutely excels.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best BBQ I ever had. This is my second. I wore one out and don't think I could ever go back to anything else. So easy to use and no fires to put out. Food comes out moist and not dried out - even chicken. My brother-in-law liked mine so much he bought one and is crazy about it. Game changer for me. LOVE the little wood chip drawer so I don't have to soak the wood chips. No flare ups ever with this.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill and cooker
customer_reviews.text: Second Big Easy. Had the original for about a decade. Awesome grill and cooker. Would recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grill we have EVER owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill we have EVER owned. We have purchased some very expensive grills and they can not compare to this. The food this grill makes is AMAZING! We so far have done Boston butt, turkeys, steaks, burgers, pork chops, chicken, and a large prime rib. Once you use this you will NEVER use another grill. Easy, fast, and the best tasting food every time!!
customer_reviews.author: David  Benfield

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once and that was to cook a steak. The directions sucked but i figured it out. Mostly by process of elimination. I actually think that it will be a great grill. Its heavy duty and i will cook my first beef roast on it tomorrow. If i find something that i dont like i will edit this review. February 2nd: I really like this grill. Right now in Colorado you can imagine that it would be cold outside and yes it is. Normally below freezing. On low the grill still reaches almost 400 degrees. I have cooked steaks and pork chops on the grill and a couple of sirloin roasts in the smoking area.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ashwood

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: I love this combo smoker, roaster grill! I sprayed the top of the grill pan with nonstick spray and it cleaned up nicely. The only problem I have is the smoker box gets stuck. Smoking definitely is a must! One of the best steaks that I have ever made and it was due to the hint of flavored smoke! This unit cooks faster than my other grill. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Knight

customer_reviews.title: Such a great cooker
customer_reviews.text: These are getting harder to find and its unfortunate. Its a lot more versatile than its smaller brother the Big Easy. My family loves when I cook on it. Meat is always tender and Juicy. I have cooked Turkeys, chickens, ribs, and pork butts to perfection using this. Bottom line is I love cooking on this!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Not just for turkeys!
customer_reviews.text: I’m now on my second big easy—the first died after 5 years of heavy use and being left out in the rain. It’s great for roasting pork, beef and chicken, and the “bunk bed” is perfect for potatoes. With the grill top now I can do broccoli or asparagus and cook the whole meal outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so Smoker
customer_reviews.text: The gas control valve broke after 4 uses. They replaced it under warranty but charged $5 for shipping and kept trying to sell me stuff during the service call. The unit has been okay. I find it hard to keep at low temperatures to cook slowly. I'm always cooking at its lowest temp setting and it's still a higher internal temp than I'd like. I'd probably buy something else if I had a chance to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit about a month but just used the smoking feature today, smoked a meat loaf, came out really good. I am very pleased with the Big Easy SRG just a great item at a very good price. I look forward to many years of smoking and grilling on this unit. I will update later after more smoking, but do yourself a favor, buy one today. I have had sufficient time now to smoke and grill with the Big Easy and may I say what a wonderful unit this is and have no worry any novice can achieve great success using the Big Easy, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rileybowler

customer_reviews.title: We love, love
customer_reviews.text: We love, love, love this! Makes the easiest, best ribs ever. We've watched videos for more meal ideas: low-country boils, grilled romaine head salads, turkeys, etc. Highly recommend and can't wait to discover more uses. Easy to put together. Small and compact but loads of room for food and vegetables. May never use our old grill again.
customer_reviews.author: Mantamy

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and ability to smoke also
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one. We liked the first one so much we got another for our other residence. We move a lot for work and it fits perfect in the V of the cargo trailer. Put it together today and had steaks tonight.
customer_reviews.author: stacwest

customer_reviews.title: I love this compact 3 in 1 grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this compact 3 in 1 grill. I've been using this grill a lot these days. Operating this grill is quick and easy. I gave this 4 stars because I received this item with a non-functioning igniter in which Char-Broil have replaced after contacting them immediately. Hope this grill will last for some years to come. It always stays inside my garage.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY GELLA

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this CharBroil
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and Iiked it so much I bought another one for my son and his family at Christmas. I absolutely love this CharBroil! It is easy to use, easy to keep clean, and I have not made one thing in it yet that wasn't good! Everything turns out good. I often use flavored wood chips in the smoker and it infuses the foods with more great flavor as well as drives the neighbors crazy with the great smells it gives off while cooking! Cannot say enough good things about this cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Turkey Roaster ever.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute very best Turkey roaster ever invented. I have made shelves out of cooking cooling racks that are easy to put in and cook lots of chicken thighs, or breasts all at one time. The very best you will ever taste. Tri Tips are wonderful. I cook in and on this unit more than I do indoors. The top cooking rack is perfect for burgers and hot links, sausage and such. These is almost a stand alone unit, only drawback is it is not a smoker in the true sense of a real smoker. For that I use a Traeger .
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E. Boelens

customer_reviews.title: Great grill,  cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Everything from, steaks to a pork crown roast have all turned out wonderful, it's easy to clean. Temperature is super easy to control and once set it holds the temperature perfectly. Cons- very unhappy with the cheapness of the metal, if you grab the handles on any angle except straight up you will buckle the housing, I've repaired mine a few times but the handles will have to be taken off permanently, the slides for the grease tray are very flimsy and if you do not get the pan lined up perfectly, you will be straightening the two channels up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian w.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker, just set it and forget it
customer_reviews.text: Never really had a smoker before, I did a chicken in it and I should have got rid of my gas grill a long time ago. Applewood smoked chicken came out fantastic. Had to buy a thermopro 2 do temperature, worked out great
customer_reviews.author: allan

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was going to be ok. But junkie smoke box handle came right off. Only used it once. Sad
customer_reviews.text: The smoke box came right off. That part was from the manufacturer. I didn't assemble it. Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product the versatility and ease-of-use is awesome. The only issue that I have is you cannot get the temperature lower than 325 350 which makes it hard to smoke certain types of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A Really great grill !!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together. In spite of the limited instructions. Unit overall is a very solidly built piece. Use is fairly easy and the food comes out really tender and juicy. I loved it so much that my siblings and I brought my dad one for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Wise Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Doesn’t work. They won’t take it back
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 hours to assemble. Instructions were vague and nebulous. Once completed everything seemed to work as expected. Prior to using for the first time, we seasoned the cooking chamber as directed in the instruction manual. When we tried to grill some steaks, the wood box could not be removed to add wood chip (prior to “seasoning”, the box could easily be removed) . The box was stuck and the screws holding the handle pulled through the metal like butter. Now, Amazon are saying we can’t rerun the defective product after only 8 days. By far, the WORST Amazon experience we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Watkins

customer_reviews.title: When I picked it up the handles felt like they were going to tear right off
customer_reviews.text: The drip pan does not fit. It is not wide enough to fit on the runners so it just lays in the bottom. Also there were not enough gasket washers included in the kit. It was four short. When I picked it up the handles felt like they were going to tear right off. I guess I won't be moving it much and won't use the drawer. Not real happy....
customer_reviews.author: penpal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooker/smoker ever. This is me and my husband's second one. The first one was still working, but we thought we should get a new one because of how often we use it and our first was probably seven years old.
customer_reviews.author: Rose0010

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile. Cooking is quick, easy and convenient. Assembly was easy considering the instructions are completely illustrated. Took about an hour at a leisure pace to assemble. Cook times are really fast - takes getting used to. NOTE: Top of the cooker cooks faster than the rest, so keep that in mind. Smoker works great as well. I have a full size Char-Broil charcoal smoker and a Weber kettle. Probably won't even use them unless I just need shear capacity. I'm from the North originally and Charcoal is the only "accepted" method of cooking/grilling. But the propane convenience of the Big Easy can't be overlooked. Recommend the 22 piece accessory kit and the grill cover. They really come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Terry K.

customer_reviews.title: Jack of all Trades
customer_reviews.text: I got this to fry a Thankgsgiving turkey for the family, it did a fantastic job as a fryer =, delicately crisping the outside and keeping the inside moist and tender. The "holy grail" of holiday turkey cookers countrywide. There it sat until I decided to grill some "prime" sirloins from Costco. The steaks I was able to get the coveted diamond marks on them , but the crowning achievement was using as a smoker for ribs! Amazing ribs using 3-2-1 method, can't wait to try other BBQ favorites. Actually at this very moment am trying St.Louis ribs for the first time, can't wait for dinner!! This grill does it all decently, and a good price (mine was 169.00 w/prime)
customer_reviews.author: Meggie C

customer_reviews.title: not a super smoker.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Big Easy for four turkeys, countless ribs and steaks on top now. The smoking drawer needs higher heat to really smoke...and that can burn the food. It lightly tinges foods with the smoke on lower heat but I have to pull the drawer and blow into vent hole to get the smoke chips going again. I've found the sweet spot inside the cooking chamber which is very centered away from the walls. I hang ribs by the basket so they touch eachother almost...4 at a time. It gets 4 stars because my big grill sits idle while I use the big easy for most everything now. But I need to buy a true smoker. cheers, Jill's husband.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Larson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic grill
customer_reviews.text: if you screw up dinner now, it is your own fault!!! the grill is great! so far I have done a whole chicken and baby backs on it. 4/2019 Still love this grill. have now cooked peppers, veggies, hamburgers, steaks, pork chops.... it just works for everything. I recommend a meat thermometer. cook to the temperature required and quit guessing!
customer_reviews.author: someoneelse

customer_reviews.title: The Instructions were relatively easy to follow - had it together in approximately 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: The Instructions were relatively easy to follow - had it together in approximately 30 minutes. Tested it out ahead of time to ensure everything lit/burned properly. No issues. Thanksgiving day - Put a 20lb turkey in for 3.5hrs on 3/4 heat and it turned out delicious. This was my first time cooking a turkey and first time using the Char Broil...so needless to say, there was a bit of nervousness in case something happened, but it turned out brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!.. my past grills have all be Tru-Infrared Big Reds... for this smoker/grill, I wish it had tilt up side table(s) option and thermometer on the top and side! btw.. a word of advice.. some things cook faster then others..so, there is a learning curve ..I'd suggest a wireless thermometer... ..also.. only load half the container with wood chips. This is the BEST I have experienced with food taste!.. DANG!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill, Smoker and Roaster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill about 2 months ago and have used it to cook a whole chicken, a pork butt and some steaks. All of it turned out very good. Its like any other grill you do have to get use to the different temp. settings. The food even when more done on the outside is still very moist and juicy on the inside. The smoke chip holder is smaller and you have to add more chips for longer slower cooking. I will say it was not difficult to assemble and it took about 30 minutes to do. So far it seems to be very sturdy and I plan on using it alot. I would say its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: rondog

customer_reviews.title: I so love this. Replaced my rusted out craftsman water smoker ...
customer_reviews.text: I so love this. Replaced my rusted out craftsman water smoker on my brothers suggestion. You could use chips vs pellets, but why. Pellets so easy. The only issue I've had is that ash builds up in bottom pellet holder and stops the top pellets from smoking. Don't fill completely. Top grill cooks faster. Connect bottom meat to thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pheil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Assembled in about 40 minutes as I took my time. Everything went together perfectly. Should have a temperature gauge, and I would consider it near perfect, but I will correct that myself.
customer_reviews.author: W. Munn

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONE a must have, cook with everyday EASY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best BBQ - Smoker or Roaster or Grill EVER INVENTED! anyone can cook with this thing like a MASTER. I will never hassel over a dumb grill again. Now I know - It's having the right equipment makes cooking to perfection EASY. I have tried ever other type kind made over my last 35 yrs. Wish I would have found about this increadable cooker years ago! But I got mine now. My wife and I use it to cook every day. Grill, Roast, Smoker. Geez I love this Char-Broil.
customer_reviews.author: John Glover

customer_reviews.title: totaly awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is the best grill we have ever bought.. we are on our 3rd grill.. and if you love fried turkey, this has a basket in it. and the biggest turkey we have put in it is about 23 pounds. And you would think its fried but its not..
customer_reviews.author: kathy day

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and put together in an hour and grilled right then (after seasoning it)! You can cook 3 racks of ribs in one go. My family has 3 and they are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Darrell Sluder

customer_reviews.title: sturdy unit - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Put this together single handedly - and I'm a grandma. Well made, sturdy unit - easy to use. Only thing that could make it better is to have it on wheels for moving it around, or having a shelf or hook to hold the propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Love the Big Easy's by Char-Broil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bigger model Big Easy SRG. I have been using the smaller model for over 3 years now but decided to add the larger one so I can cook bigger turkeys for Thanksgiving. I just have to get the cook time down right as I have already mastered the smaller Big Easy and my turkeys come out moist and juicy, with a nice crispy skin. I have only used this model twice so far, but with the added bonus features, looking forward to cooking more on this Big Easy SRG!
customer_reviews.author: Evast3

customer_reviews.title: Char-Broil Big Easy Propane Grill
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cooking options on this unit, faster cooking times using less propane. The price point on this was excellent ($149 + free shipping through Amazon). Normally it runs around $225 to $250. Looking forward to experimenting with this guy. A relative turned me on to this when they cooked a 21 lb. turkey in it for Thanksgiving and it came out great.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it and thats no lie
customer_reviews.text: Love it and thats no lie. Could have been built with thicker gauge material, smoke drawer feels like it will twist or break when removing. Cannot reduce heat enough to slow-smoke, have to pop the lid to do this and then smoke is lost. With cover closed temp is too high even on lowest setting with gas almost completely turned off at bottle.
customer_reviews.author: G L

customer_reviews.title: Best and most versitle grill I've ever own
customer_reviews.text: Best and most versitle grill I've ever own. Not sure about the smoking capabilities, as I doubt this could keep a low enough temperature for true smoking, and I have a dedicated smoker already. I've had this grill for about 2 years and is still in excellent shape for a guy that doesn't cover his grill up after using it. Great for all our summer grilling with NO flare ups, and we've cooked our last 2 thanksgiving turkeys in the basket and they turned out awesome. Bought one for a friend and it became his favorite grill also.
customer_reviews.author: srfc

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Big Easy - it smokes, roast and grill with a small footprint. Took me half hour to put it together and this is my new go to for all meats. Went to walmart for a variety of wood chips and the dollar store for the grease drip pans.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal Girl

customer_reviews.title: So Far a Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used the grill twice so still getting used to it. Seems great so far the real test will be the reason I bought it, (Thanksgiving).
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Allen Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great All-in-One Gas Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of months and absolutely love it. I have smoked, roasted and grilled on it. Everything cooks evenly, the smoker/roaster mode makes food taste great, and the food is always moist and juicy. I cooked our Thanksgiving turkey in this, on the smoker (low) mode. The turkey was nice and crispy on the outside and moist and juicy on the outside. My family thought it was the best turkey ever. I would recommend this unit to anyone looking for an all-in-one gas cooker. The grill area isn't big, but it will accommodate 4 good sized steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome upgrades for the difference in price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 10 stars. I watched a number of YouTube videos as I was originally going to get the turkey fryer that char broil offers. This unit has the grill and smoke capability as well as being able to fry up to a 25lb turkey. Awesome upgrades for the difference in price. I did a turkey on Saturday and just could not believe the results. Brown and crispy skin and juices galore. I also tried a filet roast and it was awesome. I have a masterbuilt smoker and never got the smoke flavor that this unit delivers. Assembly was a breeze and the unit is well made. Great product char broil.
customer_reviews.author: Herman moats

customer_reviews.title: chicken came out with a crisp skin and the bobs were great. Looking forward to getting better at using it
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a few meals, chicken came out with a crisp skin and the bobs were great. Looking forward to getting better at using it. Temperature within the lower unit depends on the level, cool at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It took about 20 min for me to assemble. I love this BBQ/ smoker. This is the second one I have purchased. It smokes grills and bakes just as advertised. Just follow the directions on how to use and you will be a BBQ master!
customer_reviews.author: litia gillette

customer_reviews.title: I love it without a question
customer_reviews.text: I've used this Grill before I got mine, I love it without a question. The workmanship and quality is great. I'm giving it 4 stars because the Grease Drawer is to small. It falls trough the Channels that are suppose to hold it up. I don't think it's a workmanship problem but rather the wrong Drawer was sent. I try to prop it up in the channels so that it doesn't shift around while I use the grill.
customer_reviews.author: PeterD

customer_reviews.title: Got the grill yesterday and unpacked it like a kid at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got the grill yesterday and unpacked it like a kid at Christmas. Unfortunately, assembling it was more like an overly tired dad on Christmas Eve. The icon instructions are nor always clear and it takes more than one set of hands to put it together. But once it was together, the fun began. The grill is easy to use, easy to clean up, and made the best tasting smokey ribs and juiciest chicken legs with delightfully crispy skin. It's going to be a tasty summer with this versatile roaster, smoker, grill on the patio!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lockett

customer_reviews.title: Nice all in one
customer_reviews.text: Cooked Thanksgiving turkey according to instructions.,.. inside was still raw hours later. I think it will just take a couple of times to get it right being we've never used it. Hubby loves that there are so many options to cook with this.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Smith
